Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound  Reroute near Desplaines/Fulton
ShortDescription: Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Fulton Market, Clinton, Randolph, Desplaines, due to street blockage near Desplaines/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Fulton Market, Clinton, Randolph, Desplaines then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near  Desplaines/Fulton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/California
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, California, Madison, Western and Jackson near Jackson/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, California, Madison, Western, Jackson and over regular route, due to street blockage near Jackson/California.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Hollywood
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland and Clark due to, street blockage near Clark/Hollywood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Clark and over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Hollywood.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute near Montrose Beach
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Montrose Beach, due to a defective gate near Montrose Beach.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Montrose Beach, due to a defective gate near Montrose Beach.

Eastbound buses will operate via Wilson, Marine and line cut.

Westbound buses will operate via Marine, Wilson and line cut.

Allow extra travel time.
